When you book with Petmo, your pet has their own private transport. If your pet is a cat, then yes — Petmo requires cats to be transported in a kennel or crate.

page_content: Petmo 833-GO-PETMO Contact Us 6 AM - 11:00 PM EST What We Do Why Choose Petmo How it Works Testimonials FAQ’s X Welcome to Petmo! Pet Taxi Service for Pets and their People 833-GO-PETMO 833-467-3866 CONTACT US NOW What We Do Local and Long Distance Pet Taxi Service Petmo offers first-class pet taxi service for all breeds, including large dogs, large cats, reptiles and birds. Pets can ride alone or with their people, including pet professionals, senior citizens, and owners of service, emotional support, and therapy animals. We take care of our passengers by providing VIP services that ensure travel is stress-free and accommodate your specific needs as our passenger while you and your pet travel in style. Other car services often overcharge you by adding pet fees, or decline your pet to ride, Petmo’s chauffeurs are dedicated to providing VIP service for you and your pet. From first contact to after you arrive at your destination, meeting your specific pet transport needs is our first priority. LOCAL TRAVEL Ride with your pet or they can travel solo to the groomer, veterinarian, pet spa, play date — anywhere! Petmo is proud to offer a safe experience in New York City, including the Bronx, Brooklyn, Queens, Staten Island, Manhattan, and Long Island, New Jersey, Connecticut and Westchester. LONG-DISTANCE TRAVEL Travel by car service with your animal family member, or your pet can ride by themselves or with their siblings to 48 states and Washington, D.C. (We do not service Hawaii or Alaska.) Petmo provides walks, water, and care to ensure an enjoyable and comfortable experience. AIRPORT TRIPS Petmo provides airport transfers to and from all major airports: JFK, LaGuardia, Newark, Teterboro, MacArthur, and Westchester. Petmo is the perfect option for safe and reliable pet transport. From pickup to dropoff, Petmo is your pet transportation solution. LARGE BREEDS Other car services often decline large breeds or overcharge you by adding additional fees. Petmo provides all breeds service. This includes big dogs, big cats, reptiles and birds. Our service is designed to ensure all large breeds are comfortable and safe. UNACCOMPANIED PETS Your pets can ride all by themselves to any location you need to get them to. We also allow for other sibling pets to ride together. Animal family members must get along in close quarters. EXTENDED SERVICES We offer pet-care assistance to all clients including senior citizens who need help getting their pet supplies delivered to their residence, and also assist them with getting their pet into the kennel for transportation or our Petmo vehicle. Petmo is designed to help seniors and pet parents by providing an easy way to get around with their pet and offering assistance where we can. RELOCATION SERVICES Petmo provides an easy, comfortable and convenient way to transport your pet or you and your pet across the country by car service, helping you move your life to 48 states and Washington, D.C. (We do not service Hawaii or Alaska.) Petmo provides walks, water, and care throughout the duration. B2B PARTNERSHIPS Petmo partners with adoption centers, vets, groomers, animal hospitals, pet daycares, pet spas, boarding facilities, pet hotels and pet events to work as an extension of their team when pet transport is needed. HOURLY TRIPS Book an as-directed (hourly trip) and your driver will wait for you to complete your vet appointment, groomer visit, or emergency visit. Run errands with multiple stops and you can order your service by the hour. Longer time frames available. Two hours minimum required. Why Choose Petmo Service Tailored to You​ Petmo makes it easy to travel with your pet. We can provide walk-up ramps, crates/kennels, a cat carrier, or a pet harness. Choose your preferred accessory during reservation. Private Door-to-Door Service All Passengers Welcome Tailored VIP Services Safety First White-glove pet taxi services for dogs, cats, and other animals within New York City, including the Bronx, Brooklyn, Queens, Staten Island, Manhattan, and Long Island, New Jersey, Connecticut and Westchester. Our experienced chauffeurs will open and close doors, assist with luggage or kennel, and provide complimentary water. Download our Petmo App or contact us now . Pets can ride solo, with other pet siblings, or with people. We welcome parents, pet professionals, senior citizens, and owners of service, emotional support, and therapy animals. We do not discriminate against any breed (although we regret that we cannot accommodate horses, cows, pigs, or llamas ☺ ). All passengers 18 years of age and older are welcome. Minors must be accompanied by an adult. By offering pet accessories for the vehicle, Petmo provides comfortable, pleasant surroundings to keep your pet calm for the duration of the trip. Your pet can stretch out in our climate-controlled economy or luxury vehicles. Petmo provides bottled drinking water. If the service extends for more than one hour, we can take your pet for a walk. We take the safety of our passengers very seriously and pride ourselves on our reputation. We require background checks on each of our chauffeurs/drivers, each driver completes a Petmo safety course, and each client receives their driver’s contact information prior to the scheduled pickup time. Drivers are pet lovers, with some studying to be in the pet-serving industry — a quality we search for. We'll Love Your Pet, Just as You Do! Our drivers are experienced chauffeurs who are also animal lovers. These qualities ensure that all of our passengers are cared for as if they were our family. No matter what you have planned with your pet, let Petmo take you there. Pet Playdates Let Petmo take your furry friend or both of you to your playdate. Even if it’s a day road trip, just book in advance and Petmo will be your friend for the ride. Veterinarian Visits​ Have a checkup coming up? Petmo is the perfect way to travel to all health-related appointments on time. Pre-book your pickup and dropoff times. Pet Daycare Do you have a consistent morning dropoff or you’re leaving for a weekend and have arrangements for your pet? You can rely on Petmo for timely pickups and consistent care. Groomers Petmo can pick up and drop off your pet for any appointment you make, without needing you to be there, while you know exactly where your pet is at all times. Big Pet Gig in Town? Petmo provides fleets of vehicles for travel between hotels and Madison Square Garden/Jacob Javits Center for Westminster Kennel Club, American Kennel Club (AKC Meet the Breeds), World Dog Expo, and Cat Camp NYC. How Petmo Works Step 1: Finalized Your Travel Itinerary? Submit a Ride Request. Fill out our Ride Request Form with your pet’s travel details. Step 2: Confirm Your Ride After reviewing your request, we’ll email pricing. Once confirmed, your Petmo reservation will be secured. Step 3: Receive a ride confirmation. Step 4: Load up in our ride with or without our help. Step 5: Track your pet if you’re not with them. Download our Petmo App on Google Play or the Apple Store. Step 6: Pet arrives safely, and you’re notified. Happy Customers​ Testimonials Petmo was founded by combining years of premier chauffeur service experience with a clear vision to fill the gap in safe, reliable transportation for our furry and feathered companions. "Our driver was extremely professional, nice and on time, and the dispatcher addressed my questions and concerns in a short time." — F. Berkowitz "I was very impressed with the overall experience. From the initial telephone conversation, through the changes and the willingness to be flexible as the situation changed because of weather related issues. My driver was top notched.” — TM Walker "The driver was amazing and nice! Very communicative. I will definitely be using your service again!” — T. Dixon "I couldn’t be happier with the transport you provided. It was great and the car was clean and roomy. Thank you for your great service too! I will continue to refer

Click Here To Book Your Pet's Transportation Contact Us About Us: Elite Pet Ride transports pets locally or all around the United States & Canada. All our vehicles are climate controlled & comfortable minivans with pet friendly interior. Our drivers have experience making sure all transports are comfortable & stress-free as possible. We are devoted animal lovers who strive to place animal safety & comfort as top priority. Our lines are open 24 hours a day providing around the clock services. Services & Rates For All Emergency Transportations please call us for a Quote We Service all Airport Transportation for JFK, Laguardia & Newark Airport (All other Airports outside of New York, you must call/text for a quote) Local Transportation Common destinations include veterinarian appointments, grooming appointments, and boarding facilities. We offer harnesses, collapsible crates, ramps and in-house assistance if necessary. Please contact us for further information. We Guaranteed to beat any competitors price! (3 hour notice for cancellation is required to avoid the cancellation fee) Our drivers are attentive, accountable & experienced. Elite vehicles are clean and provide all amenities such as central air conditioning and ventilated interior. For space and comfort, the inner seats are stored away to accommodate multiple pets, crates and luggage while still providing back seating for up to 4 passengers. We provide harnesses, collapsible crates, stretchers and ramps for elderly pets if necessary for easy access in and out of our vehicles. Our Community Follow us and become apart of our family. page_content: 0 Skip to Content Reservations About Services Reviews Press Contact Merch New Client Form Open Menu Close Menu Reservations About Services Reviews Press Contact Merch New Client Form Open Menu Close Menu Reservations About Services Reviews Press Contact Merch New Client Form Pet Cab NYC Your Pet’s Private Driver\and Concierge Est. 2018 BOOKING FORM INQUIRE NOW Featured Press: Our Services: Specialized Pet Transportation Most Popular Pet Destinations: Boarding Locations Some of our Partner/Referral Boarding Locations include: Andrea Arden , The DOG , Far Fetched Acre s, Dogs on the Farm and Maddie’s Ranch Relative or a Friend Who is Watching Your Pet Veterinarians & Animal Hospitals Physical Therapy and Rehab Sessions The Hamptons Daycare & Grooming Appointments Weddings (When you Need Your Pup to be Picked Up During a Wedding to go back home or to a boarding/daycare) Cargo or the ARK at JFK for Airports with Crates Out of Town Trips to: Upstate, Long Island, New Jersey, Connecticut, Washington D.C, Philadelphia, Boston Pet Only Rides “Your Pet’s Private Driver” We offer dedicated rides specifically designed to get your furry family members where they need to go—comfortably and stress-free. Whether it’s a vet appointment, trip to a boarding facility, ride to a relative out of town or daycare we’ve got you (and your pet) covered. Vet Cab Specialized Rides for You and Your Pet – Or Just Your Pet We provide safe, reliable, and compassionate transportation to and from veterinary appointments — including rides for pets undergoing surgery, post-surgery care, oncology visits, or those with special needs. Our experienced drivers are trained to handle pets with extra care, especially those recovering from medical procedures or injuries. They can assist your pet into and out of the vehicle and ensure a calm, comfortable ride. You can also request a specific type of vehicle that best suits your pet’s needs — whether it’s extra space, accessibility features, or a quieter ride for nervous travelers. Let us take the stress out of vet visits — for both you and your pet. Additional Services & Amenities We go the extra mile to make transportation easier for both you and your pet. The following services are available upon request: Ramps & Gurneys: For pets with limited mobility, we can provide gurneys or ramps to help them safely enter and exit the vehicle. (Additional fee applies.) In-Home Assistance: Need help getting your pet downstairs or outside? Our drivers can come upstairs to assist , so you don’t need to hire a separate dog walker or assistant. Wait Time & Flexible Scheduling: All rides include a 15-minute grace period . After that, wait time is charged per hour . If you’re unsure when your appointment will finish, we can reserve the vehicle to wait out front for you — just let us know in advance and we’ll block the time. White Glove Pet Concierge Travel support Handling of travel logistics for pets (private transport, in‑flight care, vet documentation) Pet hotel services for travelers, concierge at hotel Pet‑friendly traveling support Arranging pet accommodations, coordinating pet travel, ensuring comfort during transit. Pet Nanny Arrange flights and paperwork for your Pet Arrange for a flight nanny to fly with your pet without you there, both domestic and international International Customs & Travel Paperwork Assistance We specialize in managing all necessary documentation for domestic and international travel—whether you're shipping cargo, traveling with crates, or handling specialized transport. Our team is equipped to answer any questions regarding customs regulations and paperwork requirements for both inbound and outbound journeys. Our Services Include: Expert guidance on required travel and customs documentation Country-specific import/export regulations Crate and cargo compliance for international and domestic transport Step-by-step checklists to ensure smooth travel Assistance with Health Certificates, Travel Paperwork, and crate requirements Last Minute Requests Need Your Pet to get on a flight same day to London? Or Need someone to take your pet from the Hamptons back to the City  ASAP ? We can accommodate the most high maintenance requests of all nature. Partnerships with Leading Dog Boarding & Daycare Providers We’re proud to have established trusted relationships with some of the top dog boarding and daycare providers both in NYC and out of town. These partnerships allow us to offer: Priority access for last-minute bookings Seamless coordination for transportation and care Peace of mind knowing your pet is in excellent hands Whether you’re leaving town or handling an emergency, we work with the best to ensure your pet receives top-tier care—anytime, anywhere. Flight and Air Travel Let Pet Cab NYC Take the Stress Out of Flying with Your Pet We specialize in seamless airport transportation to and from: Teterboro (TEB) Westchester (HPN) LaGuardia (LGA) JFK Newark (EWR) Whether you're flying commercial or cargo, our service ensures a safe, comfortable, and hassle-free journey for both you and your furry companion. ✅ Spacious SUVs that accommodate all crate sizes — even the largest airline-approved ones ✅ Terminal or cargo pickup/drop-off , with optional wait time included ✅ Broker assistance available at JFK and Newark to help with export/import paperwork and cargo handling when your pet is flying internationally ✅ Crate  Assembly Leave the crate assembly to us! Whether it's putting it together or taking it apart, we've got you covered. Our team is experienced with all crate brands—big or small—and can assemble it on your behalf before your pet's flight. Sit back and relax, we’ll make sure everything is ready for takeoff! Book with confidence and let Pet Cab NYC make your pet’s airport experience smooth from start to finish. Problem Solving Our team is dedicated to providing the highest quality of last-minute service to meet your urgent needs. We understand that life happens — plans change, emergencies arise, and schedules shift. That’s why we’re here to offer reliable, compassionate support when you need it most. Whether it’s a sudden change or an unexpected event, we’re ready to help with: Emergency transportation to the vet or hospital Last-minute rides for pets traveling out of town White-glove boarding or daycare arrangements on short notice You can count on us to step in quickly, professionally, and with care — when every moment matters. About Us Pet Cab NYC is New York City’s premier luxury pet transportation and concierge service , created to bring ease, comfort, and sophistication to modern pet care. From vet visits and grooming appointments to boarding, daycare, or weekend getaways , we handle every detail of your pet’s journey with exceptional care and professionalism — so you can focus on your day while we take care of the rest. Designed for pets of all sizes , our fleet accommodates everything from small companions to large breeds and pets with mobility challenges . Whether your pet is recovering from surgery or simply deserves a smooth, stress-free ride, our trained chauffeurs provide gentle, expert assistance in clean, climate-controlled vehicles tailored for their comfort. As your pet’s private concierge on wheels , we go beyond transportation — offering personalized coordination, scheduling, and premium amenities to ensure a seamless experience from pickup to drop-off. Every ride with Pet Cab NYC delivers the perfect blend of luxury, safety, and peace of mind , because your pet deserves nothing less than the best. Reservations Our Services About Reviews Press Partner With Us Pet Cab NYC LLC      Est.2018 “Your Pet’s Private Driver” Contact Us If You Have Any Questions Regarding the Service or Want to Reserve a Ride: 917-982-6335 | Booking@PetCab.NYC Coming In 2026 Pet Cab London

page_content:
Overview:
There’s no doubt about it: Moving is stressful work. At PetRelocation, we understand this, which is why we offer superior customer service to create a stress-free experience for you or your client's pet relocation. We know there’s a lot on one's mind when moving to a new city or country – and we believe your pet’s move should be one less thing to worry about. Based in Austin, TX, we service cities worldwide -- from Namibia to New York -- and offer free consultations in addition to preferred provider discounts for select relocation companies and mobility services. We deliver peace of mind to pet owners worldwide by applying a vast amount of specialized knowledge to the pet relocation process, and our safe, door to door pet moving services have proven invaluable to thousands of clients and their pets. Recent Awards: Inc 5000: 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010 & 2009 Inner City 100: 2014, 2013 Oracle Marketing Cloud Markie Award: 2014 Austin Fast 50: 2012, 2010, 2009

U.S. and International Pet Transport Services Get a Quote Get a Quote What Sets Us Apart 20 Years of Experience 40,000+ Pets Moved 20 Pet-Loving Team Members 150+ Country Destinations 4.7 Stars on Google Facebook LinkedIn Pinterest Instagram How We Move Pets We're reimagining the way we move pets! Our pet transport process, partners, and expert employees guarantee your pet will be treated as a best friend should, every step of the way, no matter the distance. We know that every pet is different, and the regulations that affect pet travel are always changing. Sure, you could find other ways to move your pet, but if they could choose a pet shipping company, they’d choose us. Learn more about our pet transportation services! Where We Ship Pets As an international pet transportation company, we’ve helped safely deliver pets across the globe. Learn more about how our animal transportation services vary by country, from important requirements, to timelines, to understanding what’s needed to transport your pet internationally. Understanding all of the above can help the process go more smoothly. Browse some of the most popular long-distance destinations we ship to. Different Pets, Different Paths There’s no one-size-fits-all pet transport solution. Different animals require different travel needs, as do individual pets. We have the expertise to know how to ship pets across the globe while giving pet owners the peace of mind their furry family member is safe and well taken care of. Learn more about how we handle pet transportation services for dogs and cats. Dog Transport Services Cat Transport Service Other Animals & Pets Need to move a more exotic pet? We've seen it all and can help with that! From your feathered friends to your scaly companions, we can help you find the best pet transportation service for your exotic pet. Please complete this form , and we'll do our best to assist you. United Kingdom Australia New Zealand Other Destinations FAQs Coordinate a Corporate Move PetRelocation Travel Tails If this is your first time moving with a pet, you’re probably worried about all the unknowns. Our past clients remember the feeling, so they love sharing their stories of moves we’ve walked them through—even some very complicated moves—and how sweet it was to reunite with their pets on the other side. Moving Across the Pond with a Dog: Vinny’s Story “PetRelocation made the insane process of moving our animals breeze! Thank you!” —Jen A Surprisingly Complicated Move: Taking Your Pets to Hawaii “” —Ellen Navigating Moves During a Pandemic: Thunder’s Story Pet Move of the Month: Metgot Moves to Japan! Read Stories of Pets Like Yours Share Your Pet Relocation Story From Our Blog Travel with your pet like a pro! We know pet transport services are constantly changing. Whether you’re traveling with one or multiple pets, we offer advice that can help make your transition as smooth as possible. Browse the blog to stay on top of regulation changes and learn expert tips to keep your pet safe, comfortable, and happy while traveling. Gain more insight into our pet transportation services so you have peace of mind your pet is taken care of during their journey.
